item.description:
Hi everyone, our usual Thursday slot is booked up this week so I decided to see what kind of turnout we get for Friday night, we'll start at 8pm and run maybe til 9:30 or 10 and hit up IHOP afterwards perhaps?? Any other suggestions?

Please RSVP if you can make or might be able to make it so I have an idea what games to plan for.

As always bring yourself, your friends, positive energy, and openness to laugh, smile, and have fun!

Remember no improv experience required.

Any questions? email me

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: look for a mustache and sideburns
item.name: ATTN!!! Different day and time!! Improvmower Incubator 2: Beyond Thursdayspace
